title: LOOKING FOR SILVER RANKED TEAM
body:
I am looking for a rather serious team to be able to climb the ranked ladder with and can be punctual and coordinated with their time schedules. 
A few prerequisites:
1) You need to be at least Silver
2) You need to have Skype 
3) You need to be able to perform more than one role at an adequate level, but main a certain role.
e.g I main adc, but I can go mid and top if needed.

Submission letter:

IGN:
Main Role:
Other roles you are capable at:
Rank:
Age:
Favourite champion:
Reliable time available: (e.g 4pm - 8pm on weekdays and all day on weekends)

If I add you in game, it means you have been accepted.
My IGN is PvPRealm.
Thanks :)
